name: The Black Soul Curse
description:
You wake up in an Asylum, not knowing how you got there. The only thing you remember is your name. You'll need to find a way out of the Asylum. You'll learn more about the Black Soul Curse and what it does. This is a short story. Game length should be between 45 minutes to 2 hours. There is a bit of grinding if you want to stand a chance against bosses and mini-bosses. You can rest at the camp fire to regain HP and MP.

P.S: First game made with RPG Maker, so any constructive criticism is more than
appreciated. Thank you for playing my game :D.
